register create desc 1: Post your project and receive suggestions within minutes. Our reputation system will make it easy to find the perfect freelancer for your job. If your idea establishes and you build a start up around it, you already have found the right people to support you. It's the simplest and safest way to get work done online!
register create desc 2: The first step is to create a project upon your idea. There you can enter basic info like a name for your project, a description, and the budget you have for it. The second step is to add positions to your project. You decide which people you need, developers and designers, and which skills they should have. The third step is to wait till your position gets matched, welcome your future team member!
register develop desc 1: Sign in and enter your skills and get matched to projects which suit you best. Decide on which projects you want to participate and develop on ideas in a team of people which are the best matches for their positions. Solid back-end or creative front-end developer - you decide by the choice of your skills that will connect you to suitable positions.
register develop desc 2: The first step is to set up your developer profile. There you can enter all your skills and your level for each skill. You also have the possibility to import your skills from your social media accounts on LinkedIn, Xing, or even GitHub. You can also specify how many hours per week you want to spend on projects and your hourly wage. The next step is to wait for projects, where you will be the best possible match.
register design desc 1: Want to get creative and work on ideas with people that are the best choices for their positions? Sign in and set up your designer profile so you can get matched to projects that are best for you, and which will profit from your skill set. Support the project with distinctive designs and art work, so that it reaches its full potential.
register design desc 2: The first step is to set up your designer profile. There you can enter all your skills and your level for each skill. You also have the possibility to link your profile and import your skills from DeviantArt. You can also specify how many hours per week you want to spend on projects and your hourly wage. The next step is to wait for projects, where you will be the best possible match.
register create name desc: Enter a suitable name for your project to make it distinguishable.
register create short desc: Enter a short description of what your project is all about. This description will be shown on the public profiles of your participants.
register create pub desc: Enter a public description which can be seen by everyone one the project's public profile.
register create priv desc: Enter a private description which can only be seen by you and your participants.
register create budg desc: Enter the overall budget for this project.
register develop skills desc: Enter your skills and the according level of expertise. Whether you are a Java-guru or an expert in C, you will be able to express your whole skill set. You can also import your skills from LinkedIn, Xing or GitHub. Just simply drag the skills from the import panel into the right level area.
register design skills desc: Enter your skills and the according level of expertise. Whether you are a CSS-guru or an expert in Java FX, you will be able to express your whole skill set. You can also import your skills from DeviantArt. Just simply drag the skills from the import panel into the right level area.
